title: Sustainable Release of Mg(NO3)2 from Separator Boosts Electrochemical Performance of Lithium Metal as Anodes for Secondary Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01426J, Paper
Xia Shuang, ZhiFeng Lin, Bohao Peng, Xuelong Yuan, Jingzhen Du, Xinhai Yuan, Lili Liu, Lijun Fu, Rudolf Holze, Yuping Wu
Lithium metal batteries (LMBs) can alleviate the ‘range anxiety’ and have broad prospects due to their high energy densities. However, poor safety and cycling performances of the LMBs due to...
